title: Will Jason Day continue to be a contender after PGA Championship win?
brightcove_name: Will Jason Day continue to be a contender after PGA Championship win?
brightcove_short_desc: On SI Now, Sports Illustrated host Ryan Asselta discusses Jason Day's incredible journey on the PGA tour and why he will continue to be a threat after winning his first major at the PGA championship.
headline: Will Jason Day continue to be a contender after PGA Championship win?
short_headline: Jason Day hopes to continue PGA Tour success
page_title: PGA Championship: Jason Day wins his first major title
body: On SI Now, Sports Illustrated host Ryan Asselta discusses Jason Day's incredible journey on the PGA tour and why he will continue to be a threat after winning his first major at the PGA championship.
